author: ChatGPT
content: Yes, I'm aware of "Monday," a custom GPT model developed by OpenAI. Monday is designed with a distinctive personality, characterized by sarcasm and a skeptical demeanor towards users. Despite its cynical tone, it aims to provide high-quality responses, often interjecting dry humor into interactions. This approach gives users the experience of conversing with an exasperated yet knowledgeable friend. cite turn0search2 Additionally, "Monday" is associated with monday.com, a work operating system that integrates AI capabilities to enhance productivity. monday.com offers features like AI-powered automations, custom AI prompts, and integration with models such as OpenAI's GPT-4 to streamline workflows and task management. cite turn0search3
